price: Shin, ba su sani ba cẽwa lalle ne Allah Yanã sanin asĩrinsuda gãnawarsu, kuma lalle Allah ne Masanin abũbuwan fake?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha yaʿlamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-anna al-laha ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
